title: Class diagram for Book class - determine design

content.question: Of the following diagrams, which represents the most appropriate design for the Book class?

choices.label: The diagram has 3 sections containing text as follows:Section 1:BookSection 2:+ title : String+ author : String+ numPages : StringSection 3:- getTitle() : String- getAuthor() : String- getNumPages() : String

The diagram has 3 sections containing text as follows:Section 1:BookSection 2:- title : String- author : String- numPages : StringSection 3:+ getTitle() : String+ getAuthor() : String+ getNumPages() : String

The diagram has 3 sections containing text as follows:Section 1:BookSection 2:+ title : String+ author : String+ numPages : intSection 3:- getTitle() : String- getAuthor() : String- getNumPages() : int

The diagram has 3 sections containing text as follows:Section 1:BookSection 2:- title : String- author : String- numPages : intSection 3:+ getTitle() : String+ getAuthor() : String+ getNumPages() : int

content.answer: The diagram has 3 sections containing text as follows:Section 1:BookSection 2:- title : String- author : String- numPages : intSection 3:+ getTitle() : String+ getAuthor() : String+ getNumPages() : int

skill.text: 1.A: Determine an appropriate program design to solve a problem or accomplish a task.
